description: Assign an id to each unique combination of location_id and place_of_service_source_value.
comment: Primary Key for the CARE_SITE table

description: The name of the care_site as it appears in the source data.
comment: Name of the care site from the source data.

description: This is a high-level way of characterizing a Care Site. Typically, however, Care Sites can provide care in multiple settings (inpatient, outpatient, etc.) and this granularity should be reflected in the visit.
The location_id from the LOCATION table representing the physical location of the care_site.
The identifier of the care_site as it appears in the source data. This could be an identifier separate from the name of the care_site.
comment: Source identifier for the care site.

description: Put the place of service of the care_site as it appears in the source data.
comment: Source value for the place of service.
